strategy_reasoning: Using the cozy retro gaming aesthetic makes technical backend updates (embeddings, balance logic) feel rewarding and tangible, like unlocking features in a favorite RPG.
visual_style: Nostalgic 8-bit pixel art with modern soft lighting, chunky sprites, and the signature lime green (#ecf874) palette. Wholesome, Stardew Valley-esque atmosphere.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art close-up of the Pollinations bee mascot floating happily with a glowing pixelated lightbulb idea above its head. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel peach gradient background. Chunky 8-bit sprites, warm ambient lighting, sparkles of magic dust around the bee. Lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Simple pixel text bubble says 'Brain Boost'. Nostalgic, cute, and emotionally warm.
images.description: Visualizes the 'brain boost' (OpenAI embeddings) as a character leveling up.

images.prompt: Retro 8-bit pixel art inventory UI screen displayed on a soft background. A neat grid of distinct pixelated flower seeds and potions, representing different AI models. Clean, organized, and cozy. Soft mint and lime green (#ecf874) color palette. A pixel cursor hand selecting a specific glowing item. Warm lighting, comfortable vibes like the game Unpacking. Minimal pixel text: 'Streamlined'.
images.description: Represents the removal of fallbacks and hidden model support as a tidy inventory management screen.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art visualization of a growth chart that looks like a lush climbing vine on a trellis. Next to it, a simple transparent crystal jar collecting golden pixel pollen (credits). Soft lime green (#ecf874) glow effects. Background is a warm cream color. Isometric view, chunky pixels, wholesome atmosphere like A Short Hike. Pixel text: 'Open Metrics'. Beautiful and simple.
images.description: Illustrates the economics dashboard and single-bucket balance fix as a transparent, organic resource system.
